A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I cannot express in writing how disappointingly awful this sham was. The script was pitiful\, the sub-plots were pointless\, and the character development was non-existent. For all the kudos Rogue One managed to rescue for the franchise\, The Last Jedi managed to destroy.

I was afraid that The Last Jedi was going to be a massive let down - that was the only expectation it lived up to. Bad bad bad.

I will not be rushing to even rent Episode IX.
